title: Which is the best university between Amity University or Delhi University, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Delhi University has produced some of the leading names in the fields of Sports, Cinema, Journalism, Politics, and Commerce etc. The university has two main campuses- one in North Delhi and another in South. The campus at North Delhi is the home to prestigious institutions such as Miranda House, Hindu College, St. Stephens College, and Delhi School of Economics etc. and the South Campus is the home to colleges like Sri Venkateshwara college, Jesus and Mary college, and SP Jain Centre for Management Studies etc. If you have the percentage to get into the best colleges of Delhi University then obviously DU. But, if you are not getting A grade colleges of DU, then Amity University Noida is good. Amity has good environment and placements too.

DU is far better than Amity in any scenario. Usually the Govt universities are, for the most the time, far better than the PvT universities be it PU vs LPU argument or DU vs Amity or DU vs GD Goenka. Let me tell you about this too. There is a general trend in our country. “We all want private schooling but the graduation degree from a Govt college.”
